io.micronaut.security.token.jwt.config

Class LoginHandlerFactoryBearer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.security.token.jwt.config.LoginHandlerFactoryBearer

  • @Requires(beans=AccessRefreshTokenGenerator.class) @Requires(condition=LoginHandlerFactoryBearerCondition.class)
 @Factory
public class LoginHandlerFactoryBearer
extends java.lang.Object
    Instantiates a Singleton of AccessRefreshTokenLoginHandler if there is a bean of type AccessRefreshTokenGenerator and the condition LoginHandlerFactoryBearerCondition is fulfilled.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo
